entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.2°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
